TenantSecurityCertificate.name: TenantSecurityCertificate
TenantSecurityCertificate.description: Stores metric details related to public key certificate information. The certificate binds the public key to the identity of an entity.

Action.description: The action taken on this certificate. Possible values are: Added Removed Updated

ActionBy.description: The user who made this change.

ActionDate.description: The date this action was taken.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique within your organization.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this certificate is active.

IsCaSigned.description: Indicates whether this certificate is signed by the issuer (true) or not (false).

IsPlatformEncrypted.description: Whether this certificate is encrypted with Platform Encryption.

IsPrivateKeyExportable.description: Indicates whether this certificateâ€™s private key is exportable.

KeySize.description: The length of the public key.

MetricIdentfier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

MetricsType.description: The type of data being collected.

Name.description: A user-friendly name for the certificate.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant with this certificate.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant with this certificate.
